thread.title: ExoClick to Attend Digital Marketing Conference Dmexco
thread.title_full: ExoClick to Attend Digital Marketing Conference Dmexco

author: Press
title: ExoClick to Attend Digital Marketing Conference Dmexco
text:
ExoClick, the innovative ad network, today announced that the company will be attending the digital marketing conference Dmexco, to be held in Cologne from 16 – 17 September 2015. Dmexco is Europe’s leading digital marketing event targeting professionals from mainstream sectors including creative agencies, media buyers, consumer goods/electronics, FMCGs, tourism and the automotive industries. The event features over 800 exhibitors, 450+ top speakers, 90+ seminars targeting 27,000 visitors from 26 countries. The show will be attended by ExoClick's Business Development team headed up by Peter Rabenseifner.
Rabenseifner commented, “Dmexco is a fascinating insight into digital solutions, technologies, visions and innovations. It is a key event for ExoClick to attend allowing us to develop new mutually beneficial partnerships with products, companies and brands to drive our mainstream business forward.”
Rabenseifner and his team will be demonstrating to Dmexco delegates and exhibitors the potential for revenue generation utilizing ExoClick's innovative ad network platform.
To arrange a meeting at Dmexco please contact advertising(at)exoclick(dot)com
NOTES TO EDITORS
For further information about Dmexco http://dmexco.de/2015/en/Index.html
ENDS
FOR FURTHER PRESS INFORMATION:
Giles Hirst
press(at)exoclick(dot)com
http://www.exoclick.com
+34 931810272
ABOUT EXOCLICK
Launched in 2006 and based in Barcelona, Spain, ExoClick is an innovative global ad network serving 125+ billion geo-targeted ads a month to web and mobile advertiser/publisher platforms via its proprietary software.
Founded by current CEO Benjamin Fonzé, ExoClick is ranked as the 4th largest ad network in the world by W3Techs and the #1 ad network for the entertainment market. The Company has been ranked three times in the Deloitte Fast 500. The company is ranked at number 11 in the Top 20 Best Workplaces in Spain in the category of companies with between 20-49 employees (PYMES).
